name: df-reg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(creg, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define regular spaces. A space is regular if a point and a closed set can be separated by neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
